s0640.chinese: 五十年十月，武安君白起有罪，為士伍，遷陰密。
s0640.literal: Fiftieth year tenth month, Wu An Jun Bai Qi had crime, demoted to common soldier, exiled to Yinmi.
s0640.idiomatic: Fiftieth year tenth month, Wu An Jun Bai Qi had crime, demoted to common soldier, exiled to Yinmi.

s0641.literal: Zhang Tang attacked Zheng, captured it.
s0641.idiomatic: Zhang Tang attacked Zheng, captured it.

s0642.chinese: 十二月，益發卒軍汾城旁。
s0642.literal: Twelfth month, increased troops stationed by Fencheng.
s0642.idiomatic: Twelfth month, increased troops stationed by Fencheng.

s0643.literal: Wu An Jun Bai Qi had crime, died.
s0643.idiomatic: Wu An Jun Bai Qi had crime, died.

s0644.chinese: 龁攻邯鄲，不拔，去，還奔汾軍。
s0644.literal: He attacked Handan, could not capture, left, returned to join Fen army.
s0644.idiomatic: He attacked Handan, could not capture, left, returned to join Fen army.

s0645.chinese: 二月餘攻晉軍，斬首六千，晉楚流死河二萬人。
s0645.literal: Over two months attacked Jin army, beheaded 6,000, Jin Chu drowned in river 20,000 people.
s0645.idiomatic: Over two months attacked Jin army, beheaded 6,000, Jin Chu drowned in river 20,000 people.

s0646.chinese: 攻汾城，即從唐拔寧新中，寧新中更名安陽。
s0646.literal: Attacked Fencheng, then following Tang captured Ningxinzhong, Ningxinzhong renamed Anyang.
s0646.idiomatic: Attacked Fencheng, then following Tang captured Ningxinzhong, Ningxinzhong renamed Anyang.

s0648.chinese: 五十一年，將軍摎攻韓，取陽城、負黍，斬首四萬。
s0648.literal: Fifty-first year, General Liu attacked Han, took Yangcheng, Fushu, beheaded 40,000.
s0648.idiomatic: Fifty-first year, General Liu attacked Han, took Yangcheng, Fushu, beheaded 40,000.

s0649.chinese: 攻趙，取二十餘縣，首虜九萬。
s0649.literal: Attacked Zhao, took over twenty counties, heads and captives 90,000.
s0649.idiomatic: Attacked Zhao, took over twenty counties, heads and captives 90,000.

s0650.chinese: 西周君背秦，與諸侯約從，將天下銳兵出伊闕攻秦，令秦毋得通陽城。
s0650.literal: Western Zhou lord betrayed Qin, allied with lords in confederation, led world's elite troops out Yique to attack Qin, ordered Qin not to pass Yangcheng.
s0650.idiomatic: Western Zhou lord betrayed Qin, allied with lords in confederation, led world's elite troops out Yique to attack Qin, ordered Qin not to pass Yangcheng.

s0651.chinese: 於是秦使將軍摎攻西周。
s0651.literal: Therefore Qin sent General Liu to attack Western Zhou.
s0651.idiomatic: Therefore Qin sent General Liu to attack Western Zhou.

s0652.chinese: 西周君走來自歸，頓首受罪，盡獻其邑三十六城，口三萬。
s0652.literal: Western Zhou lord fled and came to surrender, kowtowed to receive punishment, completely offered his cities thirty-six, population 30,000.
s0652.idiomatic: Western Zhou lord fled and came to surrender, kowtowed to receive punishment, completely offered his cities thirty-six, population 30,000.

s0653.literal: Qin king accepted offering, returned his lord to Zhou.
s0653.idiomatic: Qin king accepted offering, returned his lord to Zhou.

s0654.chinese: 五十二年，周民東亡，其器九鼎入秦。
s0654.literal: Fifty-second year, Zhou people fled east, their vessels nine ding entered Qin.
s0654.idiomatic: Fifty-second year, Zhou people fled east, their vessels nine ding entered Qin.

s0656.literal: Fifty-third year, world came as guests.
s0656.idiomatic: Fifty-third year, world came as guests.

s0657.chinese: 魏後，秦使摎伐魏，取吳城。
s0657.literal: Wei last, Qin sent Liu to attack Wei, took Wucheng.
s0657.idiomatic: Wei last, Qin sent Liu to attack Wei, took Wucheng.

s0658.literal: Han king entered court, Wei entrusted state to obey commands.
s0658.idiomatic: Han king entered court, Wei entrusted state to obey commands.

s0659.chinese: 五十四年，王郊見上帝於雍。
s0659.literal: Fifty-fourth year, king performed suburban sacrifice to see Shangdi at Yong.
s0659.idiomatic: Fifty-fourth year, king performed suburban sacrifice to see Shangdi at Yong.
